18.18: e-li-yaa tau, “se maiq zeid yia pun i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g Kruq. se meib Zauj meib Eei tia Eei trub zov, weig zu'g meib kwavg zyruq Eei leib latg mivb zavg Baa-an zyenb.
18.45: aaq teij tavb Navq luvb Mwavj, maaib Bwrnb Jia'q, maaib tomb Byuvb Ryaauj. aa-hapg zyrug zweid Zia mivb yitq-le-en.
18.3: aa-hapg heug kruj ninb Eei huvb ting uaq taub o-Baa-Di taaib. (o-Baa-Di za'kevb Taaib zyruq,
18.43: ninb Buaj ninb Eei pru, “meib mivb huvj Jyenq Kxiq uaq puv mavg.” ninb Eei pru mivb mavg yaag Rwrnj taaib kxvq, “maiq maaib haiq Euvg.” e-li-yaa cvj kxvq siag Rung, “cvj mivb mavg maa'b!”
18.14: ib zang meib Buaj yia mivb lxd yia Eei zyruq, kxvq, ‘e-li-yaa yem naaiq.’ ninb zuvq xij taij yia.”
18.34: ninb yaag kxvq, “cvj toj Rung.” ninb cvj kxvq, “cvj toj ta'faam Rung.”
18.2: e-li-yaa zyrug mivb pwavb aa-hapg. uaq zang saa-maa-lia zu'g tomb Waav tomb vxg.
18.36: Tauj luvb maanb Mwavj ziag Eei zyavb hog, trug waag myenb, e-li-yaa, mivb nitq ziab txvb fatq tauj kauj kxvq, “o zyruq, apg-laa-ham, i-sakg, Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq meib piuj mevb meib se i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, yaag piuj mevb yia zruj meib Eei pru yaag ei Jyenq meib Paaiq Eei waag zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig.
18.35: uam zyrug lyrug Fiag ziab txvb. lyemb zwrnj maaib uam pwavq Revg.
18.24: meib Bua heug meib Bua Eei zyenb Eei Buaj, yia yaag heug zyruq Eei Buaj. haiq taub lovg trud tau, uaq taub se Tinb huvb a'q.” zwavj pc'g fivj tau, “Navq naaiq kxvq se lovj Eei.”
18.7: o-Baa-Di yavb Jauq mivb uaq zang, e-li-yaa pwavb zu'g ninb. o-Baa-Di zia'q tu'q ninb zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq, e-li-yaa aa'b! za'kevb tovb meib fai?”
18.17: ninb pwatg e-li-yaa uaq zang ninb kxvq, “se tovb meib, tovb pun i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g Kruq uaq taub fai?”
18.11: ib zang meib heug yia mivb lxd yia Eei zyruq kxvq, ‘e-li-yaa yem naaiq.’
18.33: ninb zx'q zaavb an Jyenq ziab txvb kub vwaaig, zx'q vovb Va'q penj yetg Ganj yetg Ganj, an Jyenq zaavb kub vwaaig. ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj myenb, “zaavb pyei Tovq uam taaib toj ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zaavb kub vwaaig.”
18.16: o-Baa-Di zyrug mivb pwavb aa-hapg yaag Buaj ninb. aa-hapg zyrug mivb pwavb e-li-yaa.
18.40: e-li-yaa Buaj ninb Bua, “zx'q Baa-an Eei trug waag myenb a'q. maiq tuvq pun yetg taub pyauj Dutq.” zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q ninb Bua. e-li-yaa txb ninb Bua mivb Tauj Ki-son Do'q, yem uaq taij Revg ninb Bua.
18.37: Toq meib tau yia. o zyruq aa'b! Toq tau yia weig pun naaiq teij myenb hiuq tu'q meib, zyruq, se Tinb huvb. meib yaag pun ninb Bua kxiq Hruq Rwrnj taaib.”
18.4: ye-se-Ben taij zyruq Eei trug waag myenb uaq zang, o-Baa-Di txb yetg pc'q taub trug waag myenb pivj Jyenq i nxm Bcvb Kwrtq, yetg nxm Bcvb Kwrtq Mmd zyepg taub. ninb yaag txb Fuaq Zauj uam mivb Jwav ninb Bua.)
18.12: yia yetq leib Gxi meib, zyruq Eei sivj livb xij txb meib mivb haiq nxm txvj yia maiq hiuq. sij kxvq yia mivb Buaj aa-hapg, ninb yaag lxd maiq pwatg meib, ninb zyrug taij yia a'q, maiq kunq yem yia, meib Eei pru, lunj Eei zyavb hog Tauj ib zang yia Taaib zyruq.
18.46: zyruq Eei Qa'q Fiag e-li-yaa. ninb zyrug pcv tomb lwi faauj fapq Jyenq hrub Laav, Tiuj Fiag Daavg aa-hapg Tauj yitq-le-en.
18.13: yia Eei zyruq aag, maiq maaib haiq taub Buaj meib, ye-se-Ben taij zyruq Eei trug waag myenb uaq zang yia Navq haiq nx zruj? yia txb yetg pc'q taub zyruq Eei trug waag myenb pivj i nxm Bcvb Kwrtq. yetg nxm Kwrtq Mmd zyepg taub. yia yaag txb Fuaq Zauj uam mivb Jwav ninb Bua.
18.26: ninb Bua zyrug zx'q yetg taub, tovb txb taaib pun ninb Bua Eei vovb kruq, liug leid zyavj Revg. yem luvb Dxm ninb Bua heug Baa-an Eei Buaj Tauj luvb aanj. ninb Bua heug, “o Baa-an aa'b! tau yia Bua maa'b!” mq paag maiq maaib haiq Euvg Qiaj. maiq maaib haiq taub tau. ninb Bua yaag Wiv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ziab txvb Zavj heij.
18.28: ninb Bua zyrug heug kaub Bwi teij. ninb Bua yaag ei Jyenq ninb Bua Eei leid lovg Ru'g Zauj Zavb navq kwetq ninb Bua Eei sin pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq.
18.8: e-li-yaa tau, “zeid Eei, tovb yia. mivb Buaj meib Eei zyruq, ‘e-li-yaa yem naaiq.’+”
18.9: o-Baa-Di kxvq, “yia zruj txvg haiq Euvg meib Zivj zx'q yia, meib Eei pru, Jiu pun aa-hapg huvb taij yia?
18.32: e-li-yaa lovg naaiq teij la'pyeiq weig zyruq Eei mevb Zeij nxm ziab txvb. ninb cvj wetq zwrnj Wiv kxmj ziab txvb kauj an zyepg Mmd kxvg uam.
18.21: e-li-yaa mivb nitq fatq zwavj myenb, txv Jyenq ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Bua Eei Hruq xij Buvb Byenq naaiq teij i tiug Jauq Tauj haiq zang? sij kxvq zyruq se Tinb huvb, kan ninb maa'b! mq paag sij kxvq Baa-an se Tinb huvb, kunq kan ninb a'q.” zwavj pc'g fivj maiq tau yetg Jruj.
18.23: Toq txb i taub vovb kruq taaib pun yia Bua. pun Baa-an Eei trug waag myenb kinq taub yaag Va'q penj yetg Ganj yetg Ganj, an Jyenq zaavb kub vwaaig mq paag maiq tuvq tyemq trud. yia yaag liug leid yetg taub an Jyenq zaavb kub vwaaig mq paag maiq tyemq trud.
18.6: ninb Bua zyrug pun Gxi yetg taub mivb yetg puv Dau. aa-hapg kanb mivb puv, o-Baa-Di mivb puv.
18.44: ta'Zyetq Rung uaq Rung ninb Eei pru kxvq, “maaib txq Bwrnj faij Eei, lomb myenb Eei puab zaavq yem Kxiq faauj.” e-li-yaa zyrug kxvq, “mivb Buaj aa-hapg, ‘liug leid maab Zia Fiag mivb a'q. Riaj Byuvg haib tavq Jyenq meib.’+”
18.20: aa-hapg pun waag mivb Tauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yaag pun yetg zuvq trug waag myenb kapq zunq yem Kaan-men Bov.
18.5: aa-hapg kxvq Buaj o-Baa-Di, “xij zu'g saau kxmj naaiq nxm teib puv maaib uamb zivq Eei txvj Zauj nxmb nxm hxvd mavg kaaj. Riaj haib lxd tu'q teij miaq yuvd lxb maad, Fruj lxb maad Eei mcvg, pun maiq zu'g taig.”
18.19: ib zang meib xij zu'g heug i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kapq zunq yem Kaan-men Bov pwavb yia. yaag xij zu'g txb Baa-an zyenb Eei feij pc'q Mmd zyepg taub trug waag myenb Zauj aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei feij pc'q taub, tovb Jwavg ye-se-Ben huvb maag Eei tiab Eang uaq teij trug waag myenb.”
18.38: zyruq zyrug pun trud Fiag taaib puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zaavb Zauj la'pyeiq Zauj nia Qwi Revg, yaag puaq yem zwrnj Eei uam Gaai.
18.31: e-li-yaa zx'q zyepg Eeig nxm la'pyeiq ziuj yaa-Kopq Eei txn pun Fiag Eei fivj. se tovb zyruq kxvq Buaj naaiq taub yaa-Kopq, “meib Eei Buaj xij zu'g heug i-saa-laa-en.”
18.27: zyavj luvb aanj, e-li-yaa Jiad kxn Wrtq ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “cvj heug kaub Lo teij maa'b! ninb penj yetg taub zyenb, Riaj ninb Eei Hruq Namq Jyenq kanb tiug Jauq fai la'Eauq haiq Euvg, fai Zwrtq Jauq mivb haiq Dau. Riaj ninb pweij mFxmb, xij zu'g heug ninb Eia.”
18.41: e-li-yaa kxvq Buaj aa-hapg, “kunq mivb Eang mivb hopq a'q, weig zu'g ib zang maaib tomb Byuvg Eei Qiaj.”
18.1: Jiaj taaib laub Eei, Tauj luvb haand Eei ta'faam Havj, zyruq kxvq Buaj e-li-yaa, “mivb pwavb aa-hapg huvb a'q. yia zyrug pun luvb twib Byuvg Fiag Daub peib.”
18.39: zwavj pc'g fivj pwatg liud naaiq teij sig, ninb Bua Pua'q Fiag Dau kxvq, “zyruq se Tinb huvb. zyruq se Tinb huvb.”
18.10: yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei zyruq, maiq maaib haiq fivj myenb fai haiq nxm kua'q yia Eei zyruq maiq Paaiq myenb mivb lxd meib. haiq fivj myenb fai haiq nxm kua'q Eei myenb kxvq meib maiq yem naaig, huvb tiaj pun ninb Bua hruq waag kxvq ninb Bua za'kevb lxd maiq pwatg meib.
18.25: e-li-yaa kxvq Buaj Baa-an Eei trug waag myenb, “meib Bua kinq taub vovb liug leid zyavj Daavg weig zu'g meib Bua myenb Zamq. kunq heug meib Bua Eei zyenb Eei Buaj, mq paag maiq tuvq tyemq trud.”
18.22: e-li-yaa kxvq Buaj myenb, “zruj zyruq Eei trug waag myenb Kuvj zevg yia kanb Du'g taub Navq. mq paag maaib Baa-an Eei trug waag myenb feij pc'q Mmd zyepg taub.
18.42: aa-hapg zyrug mivb Eang, mivb hopq. mq paag e-li-yaa faauj uaq Jiaj Kaan-men Bovb nivq mivb kweig Fiag Dau, Myen yem i puv Zivb Bx'g Bu'Dovj.
18.15: e-li-yaa kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei zyruq, se nrnb Jiaj Eei zyruq, tovb yia fub suj uaq taub, lcvd waag, ib Nxi yia Dovg haaij zuvq xij mivb pwavb aa-hapg.”
18.29: Fiag aanj ninb Bua Fob Fob Faaib Faaid Eei heug Jyenq mivb Tauj luvb maanb Mwavj, ziag Eei zyavb hog. mq paag maiq maaib haiq Euvg Qiaj Bwi, maiq maaib haiq taub tau, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub mwavj.
18.30: e-li-yaa kxvq Buaj pc'g fivj, “taaib yia naaiq maa'b!” ninb Bua zyrug mivb ninb uaq. e-li-yaa zyrug zxg zyruq Eei ziab txvb weig zu'g ziab txvb Baav mig a'q.

8.18: mq paag zyruq kxvq Buaj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, ‘meib Jiad Hruq weig yia Eei mevb lyepg nxm pyauq se lovj haig a'q, weig zu'g meib maaib naaiq Euvg za'eij yem meib Eei Hruq.
8.45: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag, pun ninb Bua tu'q hivb.
8.3: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib Tauj, sai myenb zyrug prub lcvd vcvg waag faav.
8.66: Ga'haaq uaq Nxi huvb tiaj Buaj pc'g fivj Rwrnj. ninb Bua pwav waag pun huvb tiaj zyrug Rwrnj pyauq, za'kevb Fyenb yrub a'Neiq haig weig zyruq pun ninb Eei pru, Daa-witq, Zauj ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, tu'q lovj Eei yetg zuvq sig.
8.43: Toq yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj haid yaag ei Jyenq naaiq taub kanb fivj myenb Toq Eei waag zruj, weig pun maang fivj myenb hiuq tu'q meib Eei mevb yaag kamb Riaj meib, Taaib meib, Navq meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, kamb Riaj meib, Taaib meib nx. ninb Bua yaag haib hiuq tu'q yia Zeij naaiq nxm pyauq, myenb kan meib Eei Buaj heug.
8.50: Toq kwavg meib Eei myenb Eei zwid, tovb paamd zwid txvg meib uaq teij pc'g fivj. Toq kwavg Gxi ninb Bua zruj txvg meib Eei yetg zuvq sig yaag pun Bx'q hivb ninb Bua uaq teij winb wavq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua,
8.14: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb Zxg kapq zunq sruq Jyenq uaq, saa-lo-mxn huvb Win Rwrnj taaib pwav waag pun ninb Bua.
8.48: sij kxvq ninb Bua yem Zaavq ninb Bua uaq teij winb wavq Eei teib puv pwavq Hruq pwavq eij Rwrnj taaib lxd meib, cvj huvj Jyenq meib Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv Zauj meib kinq taaib Eei zivb Zauj yia weig meib Eei mevb Zeij taaib Eei pyauq,
8.34: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj yaag kwavg meib Eei pc'g fivj Eei zwid, txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib yem meib Zeij pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv.
8.2: Zyetq Laaj, se e-Taa-nim Laaj, txij Byxq liub zipq Eei zyavb hog, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kapq zunq yem saa-lo-mxn huvb Eei Ra'Myen.
8.36: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj haid yaag kwavg meib Eei pru Bua, meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei zwid. Toq Faauj ninb Bua Navq haiq nx yem Zivj hxpg, yaag pun Byuvg Fiag meib pun meib Eei pc'g fivj Ripg Eei Dau.
8.35: “meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, haiq zang paamd zwid, meib tivg zwid pun luvb haand, maiq twib Byuvg Fiag, ninb Bua zyrug Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj, Eyemg meib Eei Buaj yaag kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid,
8.24: meib ei Jyenq meib Zauj meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag zruj. meib kanb Eei Rwib lcvd, meib kanb Eei puad ib Nxi yaag zruj zyavj a'q.
8.61: Navq naaig meib Bua hxpg zu'g zyepg zua'q Hruq kan zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb. xij zu'g ei Jyenq ninb Eei livg, kan lovj ninb Eei leib latg Navq ib Nxi nx.”
8.7: Ke-lu-Bim yav Daatq lcvd vcvg waag faav Eei txvj kub vwaaig yaag Ria Jyenq lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj kcv faav Eei Dyavj.
8.17: “yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Jiad Hruq xij weig zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb Eei mevb, lyepg nxm pyauq.
8.58: Toq pun yia Bua Eei Hruq kwei ninb, kan ninb Eei yetg zuvq tob leid, yaag ei Jyenq ninb Jiu pun Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leib latg Zauj livg Zauj leid.
8.49: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag, yaag Kxb lyenb ninb Bua.
8.11: laaij Bwrnj, sai myenb maiq haib zruj kov fub suj, weig zu'g zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem pwavq zyruq Eei pyauq.
8.33: “meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, haiq zang paamd zwid zyrug zu'g winb wavq hivb ninb Bua, Ga'haaq ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib lxd meib yem naaiq meib Eei pyauq Eyemg meib Eei Buaj, tauj kauj Jrub meib,
8.16: ‘yem yia txb yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Zwrtq i-yipq taaib, yia maiq kinq haiq fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei haiq nxm zivb weig yia Eei mevb lyepg nxm pyauq. mq paag yia kinq Daa-witq taaib kunq yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb.’
8.40: Navq naaig weig pun ninb Bua yem meib Zeij pun yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv yetg liud kamb Riaj meib, Taaib meib.
8.59: Toq pun yia tauj kauj Jrub zyruq naaiq teij waag Nxib Nxi mwrnb mwrnd yem nitq zyruq fatq. yaag Toq ninb Kxb lyenb ninb Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, ziuj ninb Bua mrud Nxi Qyemj lovg Eei,
8.37: “sij kxvq yem naaiq nxm teib puv pwavb tomb vxg, fai putq tomb wrnb pcvg, fai Byaub Jiaj Buaq, putq latg trud, fai Jopg Eeig faanq, fai kcvb mau faanq, fai maaib winb wavq weib kxmj xij Bx'q meib Bua Eei haiq nxm zivb, fai maiq kunq pwavb zu'g haiq Euvg ze'g naang, haiq Euvg pcvg,
8.4: ninb Bua txb zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Zauj wig pwavb Eei Dopg liub Zauj yetg zuvq Jaab txvj. sai myenb Zauj le-wi myenb kcv faauj.
8.51: weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj meib Eei pc'g fivj, meib Ripg Eei pwrng, tovb meib txb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, Navq yem sinj Lia'q Eei trub lrub txb Zwrtq taaib.
8.62: huvb tiaj Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zwavj pc'g fivj yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen fovg hxg ziag.
8.12: uaq zang saa-lo-mxn tauj kauj kxvq, “o zyruq aag, meib pun Ba'Nxi yem uaq luvb, mq paag zyruq kxvq zyruq xij yem Mwavj haig Eei Bwrnj ka'Euad.
8.46: “meib Eei pc'g fivj haiq zang paamd zwid txvg meib, (weig zu'g maiq maaib haiq taub paamb myenb maiq paamd zwid), meib zyrug Qiaj Jiad ninb Bua, zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun winb wavq Zaavq ninb Bua mivb Tauj winb wavq Eei teib puv, maiq kunq ko fai fatq,
8.13: yia weig meib Zeij zyavj yetg nxm Rweig haig Eei pyauq, se zruj nxm txvj weig pun meib yetg liud yem.”
8.26: o i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq meib ib zang zruj zyavj ziuj meib Zauj meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag.
8.28: o zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq mwavj meib Eei pru tauj kauj Jrub Eei waag. Toq mwavj ib Nxi meib Eei pru yem meib Eei Ra'Myen tauj kauj Toq naaiq teij waag.
8.54: saa-lo-mxn kweig Fiag zyruq Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen suv puad huvj Jyenq luvb tauj kauj, Jrub zyruq naaiq teij yetg zuvq waag liud, ninb Jiad sin taaib
8.63: saa-lo-mxn fovg hxg ziag pun zyruq weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq maaib i waang i Zin taub vovb Zauj zyepg Eeig waang taub yuvb Zauj pa'ki yuvb. huvb tiaj Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q zavg zyruq Eei pyauq fuvj pun zyruq.
8.8: kcv faav Eei Dyavj Daauq Eei. yem sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Eei Ra'Myen mcvj, se yem Zivb Revg txvj uaq Qovj, zuvq mavg tu'q pwatg naaiq teij Dyavj. mq paag yem Zivb Revg txvj ka'Eiag mcvj mavg maiq pwatg a'q. naaiq teij Dyavj Zxg yem naaig Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
8.9: lcvd vcvg waag faav Kuvj maaib tovb mo-se yem ho-lepq Bov an uaq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq. Zwrtq liud naaig maiq maaib haiq Euvg. naaiq teij i Kwaaiq la'pyeib penq se i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv, Ga'haaq zyruq Zauj ninb Bua lyepg Eei vcvg waag
8.32: Toq meib yem kub vwaaig luvb mwavj yaag ei Jyenq zruj. Toq syemq meib Eei pru Bua yaag tivg zruj txvg uaq taub Eei zwid, pun ninb ziuj ninb zruj Eei zu'g Daamb txv, cvj tivg maiq zruj txvg uaq taub maiq maaib zwid, pun ninb ziuj ninb zruj Eei tu'q lovj.
8.21: yia liug leid zyavj txvj an lcvd vcvg waag faav. faav ka'Euad maaib tovb zyruq txb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq zang ninb Zauj ninb Bua lcvd Jiad Eei vcvg waag.”
8.64: tovb uaq Nxi huvb tiaj zx'q laatg ka'Euad, Bu'Dovj Eei txvj, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj, saaj Zivb Revg. ninb yem uaq fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei scvb Kuq Eei Mei, weig zu'g yem zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj Eei tovb si'q ziab txvb faij haig, an maiq Fiag puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei scvb Kuq Mei.
8.57: Toq zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb Zauj yia Bua yem Navq ninb Zauj yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Bua yem uaq nx. Toq ninb maiq tuvq leib Gxi yia Bua fai kwavg yia Bua.
8.23: ninb kxvq, “o zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, yem kub vwaaig luvb fai ka'Diaq Dau maiq maaib Tinb huvb Navq meib nx. meib ei Jyenq meib lcvd Eei vcvg waag yaag pun Ziv meib zyepg zua'q Eei Namq meib Eei pru, tovb lovg Revg Hruq kan lovj meib uaq teij.
8.6: sai myenb zyrug txb zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq an faav Eei txvj, sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj, se kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj, yaag an Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei Daatq ka'Diaq mcvj.
8.55: sruq Jyenq lovg Qiaj Lo Eei pwav waag pun kapq zunq Eei yetg zwavj i-saa-laa-en myenb. ninb kxvq,
8.44: “meib Eei pc'g fivj Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Bx'q Jaaj, maiq kunq meib Paaiq ninb Bua mivb haiq nxm txvj, ninb Bua yaag huvj Jyenq zyruq kinq taaib Eei zivb Zauj yia weig meib Eei mevb lyepg taaib Eei pyauq,
8.20: “ib zang zyruq ei ninb lcvd Eei waag zruj. yia Ripg Jyenq yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, zweid Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb weig, Navq zyruq lcvd nx. yia yaag tu'q weig zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei mevb, Zeij zyavj pyauq.
8.5: saa-lo-mxn huvb Zauj yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen kapq zunq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg zuvq yem lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen fovg hxg pa'ki yuvb Zauj vovb weig zruj ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zamq! haig, zuvq funj maiq Ziv, saauq maiq hivb.
8.56: “Zev zyruq, tovb pun i-saa-laa-en myenb hitq Kwrnj Navq ninb lcvd Eei waag nx. ninb ei Jyenq ninb lovg ninb Eei pru, mo-se, lcvd Eei yetg zuvq lovj Eei waag, maiq puvj Dxtq yetg Jruj.
8.53: o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib yem luvb Diaq Eei maang fivj kinq ninb Bua taaib zruj meib kanb Ripg Eei pwrng, Navq meib lovg mo-se kxvq txij meib txb yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.”
8.19: mq paag meib kanb maiq tu'q Zeij. se meib Eei Zyen txn xij weig yia Eei mevb Zeij nxm pyauq.’
8.38: Toq mwavj ninb Bua tauj kauj Eei waag. sij kxvq haiq taub myenb fai meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb, Jrub meib, kx'g myenb yaag Hruq mun Tauj kx'g myenb Eei zwid yaag suv puad huvj Jyenq naaiq nxm zavg zyruq Eei pyauq,
8.31: “sij kxvq maaib taub Jwavg laavd myenb zruj txvg kanb taub myenb, zyrug zu'g myenb heug Druq zyruj, xij zu'g txb ninb Tauj naaiq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, pun ninb yem meib Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj Druq zyruj.
8.52: “Toq zyruq nuvj mziv mavg Jyenq meib Eei pru, meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb. ninb Bua haiq zang heug meib Tevj, Toq mwavj ninb Bua Jrub meib Eei waag.
8.65: uaq zang saa-lo-mxn Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yem uaq Jiaj zipq. kapq zunq Eei myenb Zamq! haig a'q. maaib yem le-Bo-haa-matq Tauj i-yipq Do'q taaib Eei myenb. ninb Bua yem zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei Ra'Myen zruj Jxm hrug siag Nxi, cvj Zauj siag Nxi. yetg zuvq maaib zyepg feij Nxi.
8.27: “Tinb huvb za'kevb xij yem paamb ken fai? luvb Zauj kaub Lav Jiaj Eei luvb, meib yem maiq Fiag. uaq Euvg, yia Zeij naaiq nxm pyauq meib kaub yem maiq Fiag a'q.
8.60: weig pun luvb Diaq maang fivj haib hiuq tu'q zyruq se Tinb huvb. maiq maaib kanb taub a'q.
8.41: “kxvq Tauj kanb fivj myenb, se maiq zeid meib Eei i-saa-laa-en pc'g fivj, mq paag weig meib Eei mevb yem ko Eei teib puv taaib,
8.1: saa-lo-mxn huvb heug i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei myenb koj Zauj fivb fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, kapq zunq yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen, weig txb zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav yem Daa-witq Eei zivb, si-on, faauj taaib.
8.39: Toq yem kub vwaaig luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj haid. Toq kwavg ninb Bua Eei zwid yaag Tevj ninb Bua. ziuj kx'g myenb zruj Eei Jauq Tevj ninb Bua, (weig zu'g Kuvj maaib meib kanb Navq hiuq tu'q zwavj paamb myenb Eei Hruq).
8.47: sij kxvq yem ninb Bua zu'g Zaavq mivb uaq nxm teib puv ninb Bua kxiq Hruq kwavg zwid, yaag yem zu'g Zaavq mivb uaq teij myenb Eei txvj Jrub meib, yaag kxvq, ‘yia Bua paamd zwid, zruj txvg, zruj waaig sig,’
8.10: sai myenb yem Zivb Revg Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib zyrug maaib Bwrnj yem pwavq zavg zyruq Eei pyauq.
8.25: “zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq ib zang ei Jyenq meib Zauj meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag zruj. uaq zang meib kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Eei zeib fun faij fim, kan lovj yia Navq meib kan nx, meib zyrug yetg liud maaib zeib fun zweid i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb weig.’
8.22: saa-lo-mxn zyrug sruq Jyenq zyruq Eei ziab txvb Ra'Myen mcvj, txv Jyenq yetg zwavj kapq zunq Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb suv puad huvj Jyenq luvb.
8.42: (weig zu'g maaib myenb tu'q haid Tauj meib Lo haig Eei mevb Zauj meib Eei puad Eei tomb Qa'q Zauj meib suv puad Zwrtq zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig), ninb yaag taaib huvj naaiq nxm pyauq tauj kauj.
8.15: ninb kxvq, “Zev zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb. ninb ziuj ninb kanb Eei Rwib Zauj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, lcvd Eei waag lovg ninb kanb Eei puad zruj zyavj. weig zu'g ninb kxvq,
8.29: Toq meib Nxib Nxi mwrnb mwrnd mavg Jyenq naaiq nxm pyauq, se tovb meib kxvq naaiq nxm txvj, ‘yia xij lyepg yia Eei mevb yem naaiq nxm txvj.’ meib zyrug mwavj haid meib Eei pru Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei waag.
8.30: meib Eei pru Zauj meib Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Win naaiq nxm txvj tauj kauj Eei zyavb hog, Toq zyruq yem uaq luvb, meib yem Eei txvj, mwavj yia Bua Jrub Eei waag. mwavj haid liud yaag Toq kwavg yia Bua Eei zwid.

3.18: yia yuvd liud, Ga'haaq pua Nxi ninb yaag yuvd tu'q taub. yia Bua kanb yem Navq. Zwrtq liud yia Bua i taub, maiq maaib haiq taub Zauj yia Bua yem pyauq.
3.8: meib Eei pru yem meib kinq taaib Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj, se yetg fivj Lo Eei, zuvq maiq haib funj, maiq haib saauq maiq Revg.
3.3: saa-lo-mxn Namq zyruq yaag ei Jyenq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei livg zruj, Zwrtq liud ninb yem Lav Eei txvj fovg hxg ziag yaag puaq huv.
3.21: ta'Eeig Dxm yia Eia taaib xij pun kub vwaad hopq Exj, pwatg kub vwaad taig mig a'q. luvb za'kevb Fav, yia lovb lovj Eei mavg, pwatg maiq zeid yia yuvd Eei txn.”
3.14: sij kxvq meib kan lovj yia, mwavj yia Eei leib latg Zauj livg Navq meib Eei tia, Daa-witq nx, yia zyrug pun meib zyavb tu'q syrug Ewrnb Daauq.”
3.23: huvb tiaj kxvq, “yetg taub kxvq, ‘navb naaiq taub txn se yia Eei. taig uaq taub se meib Eei.’ uaq taub kxvq, ‘maiq zeid! taig uaq taub se meib Eei. navb uaq taub se yia Eei.’+”
3.6: saa-lo-mxn kxvq, “meib pun Ziv meib za'kevb Namq haig meib Eei pru, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, weig zu'g ninb yem meib Eei Ra'Myen zyepg zua'q Eei, Hruq zivj Eei, maaib Hruq zruj hxpg pun meib. meib Zxg Namq haig ninb yaag zanb zang Namq Zivj taaib pun ninb maaib txn ib Nxi zweid Jyenq ninb Eei weig.
3.2: uaq zang pc'g fivj Zxg yem Lav Eei txvj fovg hxg ziag weig zu'g maiq kcvb zruj pyauq weig zyruq Eei mevb.
3.20: Daamq mwrnd yia, meib Eei pru, pweij mFxmb uaq zang, ninb Jiad sin taaib. ninb yem yia Eei sinb Len Lxpq Jyenq yia Eei txn mivb an Jyenq ninb Eei ka'Len, cvj zx'q ninb Eei kub vwaab taig an Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len.
3.24: huvb tiaj zyrug kxvq, “zx'q zuv Ru'g Daauq taaib pun yia.” myenb zyrug txb Ru'g Daauq taaib pun huvb tiaj.
3.28: i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb haid huvb tiaj Navq naaiq nx tunj sig, ninb Bua zyrug Bua'g hxvb haig, weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg ninb maaib Tinb huvb Zeij pun Eei Zovb mevb pcvb fim Eei tunj sig.
3.7: “o zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb aag, ib zang meib pun meib Eei pru zruj huvb tiq yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, maiq kunq yia zruj fu'Jweiq yaag maiq hiuq tu'q Navq haiq nx pia'g Zwrtq.
3.19: luvb mwrnd zang naaiq taub msia'q txn Eei kub vwaad taig, weig zu'g ninb vatq zu'g taig mig a'q.
3.17: maaib taub kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq aag, naaiq taub msia'q txn Zauj yia Jwavg nxm pyauq yem. ninb Zauj yia yem pyauq uaq zang yia yuvd tu'q taub kub vwaad.
3.27: huvb tiaj kxvq, “zx'q kub vwaab navb pun ta'yetq taub msia'q txn. maiq tuvq taij. tovb naaiq taub zruj Zyen maa.”
3.11: Tinb huvb zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “weig zu'g meib Navq naaiq nx Toq, maiq zeid weig kanb Toq mcvg Daauq fai putq zxib fai xij myetg winb wavq Eei mcvg, mq paag meib Toq Zovb mevb weig pun meib haib samj tu'q Zwrtq haiq Euvg hxpg Eei, pcvb fim Eei,
3.5: yem ki-Be-on maaib mwrnd saa-lo-mxn Beij pwatg zyruq taaib Zauj ninb kxvq waag. Tinb huvb kxvq, “meib xij yia Zeij haiq Euvg pun meib, kunq Toq a'q.”
3.9: weig naaiq Toq Zeij pun meib Eei pru maaib Zovb mevb haib hiuq tu'q lovj, haib hiuq tu'q Zyruq, weig pun yia haib kunq tu'q meib Dovg naaiq Zamq Eei pc'g fivj.”
3.16: maaib Nxi maaib i taub maaig pwrnb sin Eei msia'q txn taaib lxd huvb tiaj yaag sruq Jyenq ninb Eei Ra'Myen.
3.4: huvb tiaj mivb ki-Be-on, xij yem uaq fovg hxg ziag weig zu'g uaq nxm Lav Eei txvj maaib mevb taub kaub Lo Jiaj. saa-lo-mxn zyrug fovg hxg yetg Zin taub scvb Kuq an uaq nxm ziab txvb puaq ziag.
3.10: saa-lo-mxn Navq naaiq nx Toq se hxpg zyruq Eei Hruq.
3.22: uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “maiq zeid lx'g. navb uaq taub se yia Eei txn. taig uaq taub se meib Eei.” mq paag ta'yetq taub kxvq, “maiq zeid! taig uaq taub se meib Eei. navb uaq taub se yia Eei.” ninb Bua zyrug yem huvb tiaj Eei Ra'Myen Navq naaiq nx Rcv.
3.12: yia zyrug ei meib Toq Eei zruj. yia Zeij Zovb mevb pun meib maaib panb zeig hiuq tu'q hxpg. Jiaj taaib Eei zyavb hog maiq maaib haiq taub Navq meib. Ga'haaq hivq yaag maiq maaib haiq taub Navq meib.
3.15: saa-lo-mxn Eia taaib zyrug hiuq tu'q ninb Beij pwatg. ninb Rwrnj ye-lu-saa-lem mivb sruq Jyenq zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav Ra'Myen mcvj fovg hxg puaq ziag Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, cvj weig ninb Eei zwavj Jyen Beng Naavj Lo Eei.
3.13: lyemb meib maiq Toq Eei, yia yaag xij Zeij pun meib. yia pun meib putq zxib, pun myenb Taaib weig yem meib Eei seij zeiq maiq maaib kanb taub huvb tiaj Dovg meib.
3.1: weig saa-lo-mxn huvb lovg i-yipq teib puv Eei huvb, faa-lo, Eei sia'q zruj auq, saa-lo-mxn Zauj faa-lo zyrug maaib Jiu Tov. saa-lo-mxn txb naaiq taub sia'q taaib yem Jyenq Daa-witq Eei zivb zuaq ninb zruj zyavj ninb kanb Eei huvb ting Zauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, yaag zruj zyavj ye-lu-saa-lem Eei zivb laatg.
3.26: navb uaq taub kub vwaad Eei maa weig ninb Eei kub vwaad Hruq mun haig zyrug kxvq, “yia Eei zyruq aa'b! Toq zx'q kub vwaab navb pun uaq taub msia'q txn maa'b! maiq tuvq taij ninb a'q!” mq paag uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq, “maiq tuvq pun yia yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb. zx'q taaib Pi'q zruj i mcvj.”
3.25: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq myenb, “zx'q navb naaiq taub kub vwaad Pi'q zruj i mcvj. zx'q mcvj pun naaiq taub msia'q txn, cvj zx'q mcvj pun uaq taub.”

21.18: “mivb saa-maa-lia pwavb i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb, aa-hapg. ninb ib zang yem naa-Botg Eei a'vung Wivj, xij zx'q uaq nxm Wivj a'q.
21.8: ye-se-Ben zyrug tevq aa-hapg Eei Buaj fiaq fyenj, yaag Bx'q Jyenq huvb Eei yenj, fuvj mivb pun Zauj naa-Botg Jwavg zivb Eei myenb koj Zauj zruj Lo Eei myenb.
21.3: mq paag naa-Botg tau, “naaiq se yia yem ovb Taaij Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. zyruq maiq pun yia zx'q pun kanb taub.”
21.21: zyruq kxvq, ‘yia zuvq xij pun ze'g naang hxig meib. yia xij kwaatq Revg meib Eei zeib fun, ta'faanb yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj meib Eei mJavg txn, maiq kunq zruj nrub fai maiq zruj nrub, Pai kwavg Revg.
21.14: Ga'haaq ninb Bua pun waag mivb Buaj ye-se-Ben, “naa-Botg zu'g la'pyeiq zov taig mig a'q.”
21.23: “ye-se-Ben c'q, zyruq yaag kxvq, ‘Juq xij yem yitq-le-en zivb ka'Euad Eang ninb Eei sei.’
21.6: aa-hapg tau, “weig zu'g yia kxvq Buaj yitq-le-en myenb, naa-Botg, ‘maaig meib Eei a'vung Wivj pun yia, fai sij kxvq meib hxpg Hruq nx, yia zx'q kanb nxm a'vung Wivj Tiuq pun meib.’ mq paag ninb tau, ‘yia maiq zx'q yia Eei a'vung Wivj Jiu pun meib.’+”
21.2: aa-hapg kxvq Buaj naa-Botg, “Toq pun meib Eei a'vung Wivj yia zruj lai Eei Wivj weig zu'g yem nitq yia Eei huvb ting. yia zyrug zx'q kanb nxm kaub lovj Eei a'vung Wivj Tevj meib Tiuq fai meib xij lovg Eaanb yia zyrug pun zig Wivj Eei Jaab zinb meib.”
21.20: aa-hapg kxvq Buaj e-li-yaa, “yia Eei winb wavq aa'b! meib lxd pwatg yia mig a'q.” e-li-yaa tau, “yia lxd pwatg meib mig a'q, weig zu'g ei zyruq mavg meib maaig kanb zruj x'q sig.
21.24: “ta'faanb aa-hapg Eei myenb, yem zivb taig uaq teij, xij zu'g Juq Eang. yem uaq naab taig uaq teij, xij zu'g Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Eang.”
21.28: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj Titq-Bi myenb, e-li-yaa,
21.7: ninb Eei auq, ye-se-Ben, kxvq, “meib zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en maiq zeid? Jiad sin taaib Fyenb Fyen yrub yrub Eei Eang Naavj a'q. yia xij zx'q yitq-le-en myenb, naa-Botg, Eei Wivj Jiu pun meib.”
21.29: “meib pwatg aa-hapg Navq haiq nx yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zatq kanb zruj faij? weig zu'g ninb zatq ninb kanb zruj faij, yem ninb Eei seij zeiq yia maiq pun ninb zu'g naaiq teij ze'g naang. mq paag yem ninb Eei txn Eei luvb Diaq, ninb Eei trub zov xij zu'g naaiq teij ze'g naang.”
21.19: xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “meib taij taub myenb cvj zx'q ninb Ripg Eei Jaab tivb maiq zeid?” Ga'haaq kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq Navq naaiq nx kxvq, Juq Biag naa-Botg Eei Ryaamq uaq nxm txvj, Juq yaag xij yem uaq nxm txvj Biag meib Eei Ryaamq.”+’+”
21.17: zyruq kxvq Buaj Titq-Bi myenb, e-li-yaa,
21.27: aa-hapg haid naaiq teij waag ninb zyrug petq ninb Eei lwib hruj, zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru yaag zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg. ninb pweij Jyenq yaag zu'q la'maab Diab Zru. Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib pwatg Hruq Raub Raub uaq.
21.11: Zauj naa-Botg Jwavg zivb yem uaq teij myenb koj Zauj Jyen ei Jyenq ye-se-Ben fiaq Eei waag zruj. ziuj ninb fuvj pun ninb Bua Eei fyenj,
21.5: ninb Eei auq, ye-se-Ben huvb maag, pia'g taaib naaig ninb, “meib weig haiq tiug Hruq Dovg naaig Raub, maiq Eang Naavj?”
21.9: uaq zeiq fyenj kxvq, “xij zu'g tivg nxm Nxi zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg yaag pun naa-Botg zweid Jyenq zwavj myenb Bu'Dovj, Lav Eei txvj.
21.16: aa-hapg haid kxvq naa-Botg taig mig a'q, ninb Zwrtq mivb Tauj yitq-le-en myenb, naa-Botg, Eei a'vung Wivj weig zx'q penj ninb Eei pwrng.
21.4: aa-hapg zyrug Rwrnj pyauq. Hruq Raub yaag Qiaj Jiad Eei weig zu'g uaq taub yitq-le-en myenb, naa-Botg, kxvq, “yia maiq haib zx'q ovb Taaij Bua Ripg Eei pwrng pun meib,” aa-hapg zyrug pweij Jyenq Zruj, Myen myenb myenq uaq, maiq Kavq Eang haiq Euvg.
21.10: mq paag lxd i taub Hruq Pyen Eei myenb zweid Jyenq Zauj naa-Botg txij Myen yaag zruj Jaaq zxvb zevj kxvq ninb zyruj Tinb huvb yaag zyruj huvb tiaj. Ga'haaq txb ninb Zwrtq mivb lovg la'pyeiq zov taig.”
21.22: yia xij pun meib Eei trub zov Navq ne-Batg Eei txn, ye-lo-Bo-am, Zauj aa-hi-yaa Eei txn, Baa-aa-Qaa, Eei trub zov weig zu'g meib Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad cvj pun i-saa-laa-en myenb paamd zwid.’
21.12: ninb Bua tivg nxm Nxi zunb Buaj myenb zei maiq Eang haiq Euvg, yaag pun naa-Botg zweid pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj, Lav Eei txvj.
21.15: ye-se-Ben yetq haid naa-Botg zu'g la'pyeiq zov taig, ninb mivb Buaj aa-hapg, “kunq mivb zx'q yitq-le-en myenb, naa-Botg, maiq Kavq pun meib uaq nxm a'vung Wivj weig zu'g naa-Botg maiq yem a'q. ninb taig mig a'q.”
21.13: uaq teij i taub Hruq Pyen Eei myenb taaib zweid Jyenq Zauj naa-Botg txij Myen. ninb Bua txv Jyenq zwavj pc'g fivj koj naa-Botg. ninb Bua kxvq, “naa-Botg zyruj Tinb huvb yaag zyruj huvb tiaj.” zwavj myenb zyrug zx'q naa-Botg txb Zwrtq ka'Eiag zi'g zivb, zx'q la'pyeiq zov taig ninb.
21.1: naaiq teij sig Jiaj liud, Ga'haaq cvj maaib teij sig Zwrtq. maaib taub yitq-le-en myenb, Buaj heug naa-Botg, maaib nxm a'vung Wivj yem yitq-le-en, nitq saa-maa-lia huvb, aa-hapg, Eei huvb ting.
21.26: aa-hapg zruj kamb Riaq haig, yruj Jiaj Eei sig, mivb zavg miub favj, Navq zyruq yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung Zwrtq uaq teij aa-mo-lai myenb.)
21.25: (maiq maaib Jiaj yetg taub Navq aa-hapg, ei zyruq mavg maaig kanb zruj x'q sig. se ninb Eei auq, ye-se-Ben, Zo'q ninb zruj.

14.18: ninb Bua yaag txb mivb zavj. i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb weig ninb Raub Eyemq Navq zyruq lovg ninb Eei pru uaq taub trug waag myenb kxvq nx.
14.8: yia petq Daa-witq Eei trub zov kunq Eei kua'q Zwrtq Jiu pun meib. mq paag meib maiq Navq yia Eei pru, Daa-witq. ninb ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg, yaag lovg Revg Hruq kan yia. ninb Kuvj zruj ziuj yia Eei mziv pwatg hxpg Eei sig Navq.
14.3: txb zyepg nxm Fuaq Zauj teij Fuab kaam Zauj pcvb mweib txvb mivb pun ninb, ninb zyrug Buaj meib naaiq taub fu'Jweiq xij Navq haiq nx.”
14.21: saa-lo-mxn Eei txn, le-hoj-Bo-am, yem yu-Daa zruj huvb. ninb faauj weig zruj huvb uaq zang ninb tu'q feij zyepg yetq Havj, yaag yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq zyepg Zyetq Havj. ye-lu-saa-lem zivb se zyruq yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj fivj Bu'Dovj kinq taaib weig lyepg ninb kanb Eei mevb. le-hoj-Bo-am Eei maa se am-mon myenb, Buaj heug naa-aa-maa.
14.14: “maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. zyruq xij weig ninb kanb lyepg taub huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en. ib Nxi naaiq taub huvb zyrug Pai kwavg ye-lo-Bo-am Eei trub zov. uaq Nxi za'kevb Tauj a'q.
14.23: ninb Bua yem nxmb nxm Bov kub vwaaig Zauj tiub tiub tomb Dyavj ka'Diaq, lyepg zavg zyenb Eei txvj Zauj la'pyeib tovg Zauj zavg aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei Dyavb favj.
14.6: mq paag Tauj kcvb Daavg uaq zang, aa-hi-yaa haid ninb Eei zaub Zaaiq Eei Qiaj Bwi zyrug kxvq, “ye-lo-Bo-am Eei msia'q txn aag, kunq pia'g taaib maa'b! meib weig haiq tiug zxv penj kanb taub msia'q txn? weig zu'g yia maaib Zyruq Eei fyenj kxvq Buaj meib.
14.2: ye-lo-Bo-am kxvq Buaj ninb Eei auq, “xij zu'g zxv meib kanb penj kanb taub myenb, pun myenb zia'q maiq tu'q meib zruj ye-lo-Bo-am Eei auq, zyrug mivb si-lo. yem uaq maaib trug waag myenb, aa-hi-yaa. tovb naaiq taub kxvq yia xij zu'g zruj naaiq teij pc'g fivj Eei huvb.
14.20: ye-lo-Bo-am zruj huvb Eig zyepg Eeig Havj, zyrug kwei seij mig a'q, ninb Eei txn, naa-Dapg, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
14.24: teib puv ka'Euad yaag maaib mJavg txn yem zavg zyenb Eei txvj zruj maaig pwrnb sin Eei myenb. pc'g fivj zruj zinb Daavg zyruq zung Zwrtq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj uaq teij fivb fivj myenb zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig.
14.28: huvb tiaj haiq zang pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, kruj huvb ting Eei pcv txb naaiq teij Txvb paaib mivb. Ga'haaq ninb Bua cvj txb Rwrnj an Jyenq pcv zuaq huvb ting Eei txvj.
14.7: meib Rwrnj mivb Buaj ye-lo-Bo-am, zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq. ‘yia yem zwavj pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj lyepg meib zruj Lo kunq yia Eei myenb.
14.29: le-hoj-Bo-am kunq Eei zyavb hog zruj liud zevg Fiag Eei sig, ninb zruj Zwrtq Eei yetg zuvq, fiaq Jyenq yu-Daa huvb Eei huvb trub taan.
14.19: ye-lo-Bo-am huvb zruj liud zevg Fiag Eei sig, ninb Navq haiq nx Bx'q Jaaj, Navq haiq nx kunq pc'g fivj, fiaq Jyenq yem i-saa-laa-en huvb Eei huvb trub taan.
14.17: ye-lo-Bo-am Eei auq zyrug Jiad sin Rwrnj Tauj Ti-laa-saa zivb. yetq laamj pia'g kcvb, ninb Eei txn zyrug taig mig a'q.
14.31: le-hoj-Bo-am kwei seij mig a'q, yaag Zauj ninb Eei ovb Taaij Bua zavj Jyenq yem Daa-witq Eei zivb. ninb Eei maa zruj am-mon myenb, Buaj heug naa-aa-maa. le-hoj-Bo-am Eei txn, aa-Bi-yam, yaag Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
14.30: le-hoj-Bo-am Zauj ye-lo-Bo-am zanb zang Bx'q Jaaj.
14.27: le-hoj-Bo-am huvb zyrug lovg tovb si'q zruj Txvb paaib tiq yaag Jiu pun kruj huvb ting zuaq kcvb Eei pcvb pyeiq.
14.11: ye-lo-Bo-am Eei myenb, ta'faanb yem zivb taig uaq teij, xij zu'g Juq Eang. taig uaq naab Eei, xij zu'g Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Eang. yia, zyruq, kxvq naaiq teij waag.’
14.5: zyruq Jaab Daavg Buaj aa-hi-yaa, “ye-lo-Bo-am Eei auq xij taaib naaig meib weig zu'g ninb Eei txn putq pcvg. meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj ninb.” ye-lo-Bo-am Eei auq taaib Tauj uaq zang, ninb zruj Navq penj kanb taub msia'q txn.”
14.9: meib zruj kaub waaig Jiaj yem Daavg meib uaq teij yetg zuvq. meib weig meib kanb lyepg Eiag Eei zyenb Eei miub favj, yaag toj miub favj. meib Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad yaag zx'q yia zxi kwavg meib Eei Ga'haaq Gaav.
14.16: laaij ye-lo-Bo-am paamd zwid yaag txb i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj Jyenq paamd zwid, zyruq zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Jiu pun winb wavq.”
14.4: ye-lo-Bo-am Eei auq zyrug Navq naaiq nx zruj. ninb mivb si-lo zivb, Tauj aa-hi-yaa Eei pyauq. aa-hi-yaa Eei Havb Jeiq koj, mziv Buaq, mavg maiq pwatg.
14.10: “+‘weig naaiq yia xij pun ye-lo-Bo-am Eei trub zov zu'g ze'g naang yaag zx'q ye-lo-Bo-am Eei taub taub mJavg txn, maiq kunq zruj nrub fai maiq zruj nrub Eei, yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Pai kwavg. yia xij pun ye-lo-Bo-am Eei trub zov zutg Revg, Navq myenb zx'q Gaiq puaq Qwi Revg nx.
14.22: ei zyruq mavg, yu-Daa zruj waaig sig. ninb Bua paamd Eei zwid Zua'q ninb Qiaj Jiad, hang ninb Bua, kaub Zamq ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Bua zruj Eei sig.
14.12: “meib kanb kunq Rwrnj a'q. meib Eei zauj yetq Zaaiq pia'g zivb, meib Eei txn zyrug taig a'q.
14.15: zyruq xij Bx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb, pun ninb Bua Navq lua'g ti'g zu'g uam Txvj Yru mivb Yru taaib. ninb cvj xij zx'q i-saa- laa-en myenb Zwrtq ninb Zeij pun ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij naaiq nxm lovj haig Eei teib puv, Navq pcv Ruvb Zwrtq nx. ninb yaag xij zx'q ninb Bua pun Raanj yem yu-fe-titg Daaib tov puv mcvj, weig zu'g ninb Bua zruj aa-se-laa zyenb Eeid Eei Dyavb favj zyrug Zua'q zyruq Qiaj Jiad.

6.14: saa-lo-mxn zyrug Zeij zavg zyruq Eei pyauq yaag Zeij zyavj a'q.
6.23: ninb lovg ka'lanq Dyavj zruj i taub Ke-lu-Bim, yetg taub zyepg Dx'g Lav, an Jyenq sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj.
6.6: ka'Diaq uaq Ravb Javq pyaa Dx'g, Bu'Dovj uaq Ravb Ju'q Dx'g, kub vwaaig uaq Ravb siag Dx'g. pyauq Eei Fovg ka'Eiag mcvj ninb Bua zruj txvj lxvj Dyavj, pun Dyavj maiq zu'g Topq pia'g Fovg ka'Euad.

6.36: ninb zruj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg penj pua yemg zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeiq Zauj yetg yemg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj.

6.29: pyauq ka'Euad Zauj ka'Eiag mcvj weib kxmj Eei Fovg tiu Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Eei favj Zauj taau Eei Dyavj Zauj Gxi taaib Eei pyavb.
6.19: sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj, ninb liug leid zyavj an zyruq Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav.
6.17: sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Eei Ra'Myen mcvj cvj maaib Qovj feij zyepg Dx'g Daauq.
6.38: Tauj zyepg yetq uaq Havj, Bun Laaj, se petq Laaj, zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Zauj pyauq Eei Euvb Euvg zruj zyavj ziuj tivg taaib Eei yetg Eeig. saa-lo-mxn lovg siag Havj zruj zyavj mig a'q.
6.31: pia'g sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Eei kcvb ninb lovg ka'lanq Dyavj zruj. kcvb zrug yaag maaib pyaa tiub lxvb.
6.30: pyauq ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Zauj ka'Eiag uaq Qovj ninb lovg Jyem timg Jyenq tamg ka'Diaq Eei Dyavb penq.
6.27: ninb zx'q Ke-lu-Bim an Jyenq pyauq ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj. Ke-lu-Bim Eei Daatq yav Jyenq. yetg taub Eei yetg puv Daatq yav tonj Jyenq yetg puv Fovg. ta'Eeig taub Ke-lu-Bim Eei uaq puv Daatq yaag tonj Jyenq uaq puv Fovg. i taub Eei yetg puv Daatq yav Zamj Jyenq Jaaj uaq Qovj Bu'Dovj.
6.11: zyruq Zauj saa-lo-mxn kxvq waag. ninb kxvq,
6.5: ninb cvj Zapq pyauq ka'Eiag mcvj weib kxmj, lyemb sivj ting Zauj ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj. ninb yaag Genj Jyenq penj yetg Qovj yetg Qovj.
6.9: saa-lo-mxn zyrug Zeij zyavj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq. ninb yaag lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavj zruj hcvb yaag zruj Dyavb penq komq kub vwaaig.
6.16: pyauq ka'Euad Ga'haaq mcvj Genj Jyenq yetg Qovj Eig zyepg Dx'g Daauq, se sivj ting kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj, yaag lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavb penq yem ka'Diaq Dau Tauj kub vwaaig hcvb.
6.37: saa-lo-mxn zruj huvb ta'feij Havj, sipq Laaj, ninb Bua lyepg zyavj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kxnb Do'q.
6.4: ninb Bua zruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei fov mwrnb ka'Euad mcvj Javq, ka'Eiag mcvj hepg.

6.22: zyavb nxm pyauq ka'Euad ninb lovg Jyem pwav kxmj Revg. sivj ting ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Eei puaq huv tiab yaag lovg Jyem pwav Jyenq.
6.12: “kxvq Tauj meib ib zang Zeij naaiq nxm zavg zyruq Eei pyauq, sij kxvq meib ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg, kan lovj yia Eei tiub tiub leid, mwavj yia Eei yetg zuvq livg, yia zyrug ei Jyenq yia lcvd Eei waag zruj zyavj pun meib ziuj yia lcvd pun meib Eei tia, Daa-witq.
6.15: pyauq ka'Euad mcvj ninb lovg sij-Daa zovb Dyavb penq weib yem ka'Diaq Dau Tauj kub vwaaig Eei hcvb. ninb yaag lovg zovb Dyavb penq timg ka'Diaq Dau.
6.13: yia yaag xij yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj, yaag maiq kwavg yia Eei pc'g fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb.”
6.1: i-saa-laa-en myenb Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv Ga'haaq feij pc'q petq zyepg Havj, tovb saa-lo-mxn zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb ta'feij Havj uaq Havj, yem Eeig Laaj, se sipq Laaj, ninb Jiad kxn Zeij zavg zyruq Eei pyauq a'q.
6.26: yetg taub Ke-lu-Bim zyepg Dx'g Lav, uaq taub yaag fib Bcvg.
6.25: ta'Eeig taub Ke-lu-Bim yaag fib Navq Eei. i puv Daatq maaib zyepg Dx'g, weig zu'g i taub Ke-lu-Bim fib lomb fib Navq Revg.

2.18: Batg-Qe-Baa kxvq, “lovj a'q. yia Tevj meib Toq huvb tiaj.”

2.3: xij zu'g ei Jyenq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Paaiq Eei waag. xij zu'g yavb ninb Eei Jauq yaag ei fiaq Jyenq mo-se Eei leib latg sru Eei yetg zuvq leib latg Zauj livg Zauj leid. Navq naaig, maiq kunq meib zruj haiq Euvg fai mivb Tauj haiq nxm txvj, meib zyrug tu'q lovj.
2.43: uaq Euvg, meib weig haiq tiug maiq ei Jyenq meib zyavq Jyenq zyruq lcvd Eei waag yaag maiq ei yia hatg Eei waag?”
2.14: ninb yaag Ripg Jyenq kxvq, “yia maaib teij waag xij kxvq Buaj meib.” Batg-Qe-Baa kxvq, “kunq kxvq maa'b!”
2.34: ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa zyrug mivb zx'q yo-aapg taij taig, zavj Jyenq yo-aapg kanb Eei Dau yem uaq teib puvb Waav.
2.2: ninb kxvq, “ib zang yia xij zu'g yavb paamb myenb yetg zuvq xij zu'g yavb Eei Jauq. meib xij zu'g henq, pun Ziv meib zruj Junb zeiq myenb.
2.36: Jiaj taaib, huvb tiaj Paaiq myenb mivb heug si-me-i taaib zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib xij zu'g komq pyauq yem naaiq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. yaag xij zu'g yem naaig, maiq tuvq Zwrtq mivb kanb nxm txvj.
2.35: huvb tiaj zyrug xn ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, zruj tomb pcvb pyeiq tiq yo-aapg. ninb yaag xn saaj-Dokg sai myenb tiq aa-Bi-yaa-Taa.
2.24: yia zyavq Jyenq zyavb Jyenq Eei zyruq, tovb lyepg yia, pun yia zweid yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei huvb weig yaag ziuj ninb lcvd Eei waag lovg yia lyepg huvb trub uaq taub zyruq, lcvd ib Nxi aa-Do-ni-yaa zuvq xij zu'g taij taig.”
2.7: “mq paag xij zu'g zruj lovj pun ki-le-aatg myenb, Baa-sin-lai, Eei txn Bua, pun ninb Bua Jwavg meib Eei tiab Eang Naavj, weig zu'g yia pyauj meib Eei kxj, apg-saa-lom, uaq zang, ninb Bua yaag zipq yia lovj Eei
2.17: aa-Do-ni-yaa zyrug kxvq, “Tevj yia Toq saa-lo-mxn huvb, weig zu'g Namq taaib ninb maiq haib vcvg meib. Toq ninb pun su-nem myenb Eei sia'q, aa-Bi-Qaakq, yia lovg zruj auq.”
2.11: Daa-witq zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb feij zyepg Havj, yem he-Bo-lon kunq siag Havj, cvj yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq faab zyepg faam Havj.
2.33: yo-aapg taij uaq teij i taub myenb Eei zwid, yo-aapg Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun xij zu'g yetg liud Daamb txv, mq paag Daa-witq Zauj ninb Eei zeib fun Zauj ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb Zauj Ripg Jyenq zweid ninb Eei weig uaq teij tu'q zyruq Eei pcvb xn Tauj maang kruq maang txig.”
2.16: ib zang yia maaib yetg Euvg xij Toq meib. Toq maiq tuvq vcvg yia.” Batg-Qe-Baa kxvq, “kunq kxvq maa'b!”
2.40: si-me-i yetq haid, ninb zx'q keb xn pwig Jyenq lxb, keb Jyenq mivb Tauj katg zivb, aa-Kitq huvb uaq, txb ninb Eei nrub Rwrnj taaib.
2.37: meib xij zu'g hiuq tu'q, ta'faanb haiq nxm Nxi meib Zwrtq zivb Jiaj uaq vaang Kitg-lon hxvd, meib Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g taig. meib kanb yaag xij zu'g Daamb txv.”
2.4: zyruq yaag xij ei Jyenq ninb lcvd pun yia Eei waag zruj. zyruq kxvq, ‘sij kxvq meib Eei zeib fun faij fim ninb Bua yavb Eei Jauq, xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq, lovg Revg za'eij zyepg zua'q Eei yem yia Eei Ra'Myen, meib Eei zeib fun zyrug Ripg Jyenq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb weig, maiq tavj.’
2.12: saa-lo-mxn zyrug Ripg Jyenq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, zweid huvb weig. ninb Eei kua'q yaag lyepg tu'q wrnq Eei.
2.46: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa. Be-nai-yaa zyrug Zwrtq mivb zx'q si-me-i taij taig. Navq naaig, saa-lo-mxn kunq Eei kua'q lyepg wrnq yem saa-lo-mxn Eei puab Diaq.
2.13: hakq-kitg Eei txn, aa-Do-ni-yaa, taaib lxd saa-lo-mxn Eei maa, Batg-Qe-Baa. Batg-Qe-Baa naaig kaaj, “meib taaib weig pcvb xn Eei Jauq fai?” aa-Do-ni-yaa tau, “zeid Eei. yia taaib weig pcvb xn.”
2.26: huvb tiaj kxvq Buaj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa sai myenb, “Rwrnj aa-naa-Totq, meib kanb Eei livb teig uaq. meib zig tu'q taig, mq paag ib zang yia maiq taij meib weig zu'g meib yem yia Eei tia Eei uaq Daavg mcvj kcv Jiaj zyruq Tinb huvb Eei lcvd vcvg waag faav. meib yaag zu'g Zauj ninb Jwavg syrug ziaj Euvg Kruq naang.”
2.28: yo-aapg mwavj haid naaiq teij sig Zwrtq, ninb zyrug pyauj mivb Tauj zyruq Eei Dopg liub nanq Jyenq ziab txvb Eei Jxv. (yo-aapg maiq Tevj apg-saa-lom mq paag ninb Tevj aa-Do-ni-yaa.)
2.8: “yem meib naaiq yaag maaib yem Baa-hu-lim taaib Eei Ben-yaa-min myenb, ke-laa Eei txn, si-me-i, tovb yia mivb maa-haa-naa-im uaq Nxi ninb zyruj yia to'g haig. mq paag Ga'haaq ninb Fiag Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib zipq yia, yia zyrug zyavq Jyenq zyruq hruq waag pun ninb. yia kxvq, ‘yia zuvq maiq lovg Ru'g Daauq taij meib a'q.’
2.9: mq paag ib zang meib maiq tuvq funj ninb maiq maaib zwid. meib se Zovb mevb myenb. meib zyrug haib hiuq tu'q xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj pun ninb. meib xij zu'g taij naaiq taub ovb mGxvb pc'g, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, Fiag Tauj yemb ken.”
2.32: zyruq xij pun yo-aapg kanb Daam ninb taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei zwid, weig zu'g yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, maiq hiuq Eei zyavb hog yo-aapg lovg Ru'g Daauq taij i taub myenb kaub lovj Jiaj ninb kanb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ne Eei txn, apg-ne, Zauj yu-Daa Eei tomb pcvb pyeiq, ye-Te Eei txn, aa-maa-saaj.
2.21: Batg-Qe-Baa kxvq, “Toq zx'q su-nem myenb Eei sia'q, aa-Bi-Qaakq, pun meib Eei kxj, aa-Do-ni-yaa, lovg zruj auq.”
2.23: saa-lo-mxn huvb zyrug zyavq Jyenq zyruq hruq waag kxvq, “laaij aa-Do-ni-yaa kxvq naaiq teij waag ninb xij zu'g kwavg mcvg a'q. sij kxvq maiq Navq naaiq nx, Toq Tinb huvb tivg yia Eei zwid, zuvq Niab Niaq Eei tivg.
2.6: weig naaiq meib xij zu'g ziuj meib Eei Zovb mevb zruj. maiq tuvq pun ninb yem Tauj Ba'pyei pc'g, tu'q pcvb xn Eei mivb yemb ken.
2.44: huvb tiaj yaag kxvq Buaj si-me-i, “yem meib Eei Hruq meib yaag hiuq tu'q meib zruj pun yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei yetg zuvq waaig sig. ib zang zyruq xij ziuj meib zruj Eei waaig sig winb pun meib.
2.20: Batg-Qe-Baa kxvq, “yia maaib ti'q tyen faib fiuq waag xij Toq meib. Toq maiq tuvq vcvg yia.” huvb tiaj tau, “yia Eei maa aag, kunq kxvq a'q. yia yaag maiq vcvg maa.”
2.5: “maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. meib hiuq tu'q sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg, Navq haiq nx zruj pun yia. ninb taij i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei i taub pcvb pyeiq, ne Eei txn, apg-ne, Zauj ye-Te Eei txn, aa-maa-saaj. yem Taaib pcvb Eei zyavb hog ninb taij ninb Bua Navq yem Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog taij ninb Bua nx. naaiq teij Ryaamq yaag kua'q zu'g ninb sai Jyenq Eei hrub Laav Zauj taapg Jyenq Eei heb.
2.19: Batg-Qe-Baa zyrug mivb lxd saa-lo-mxn huvb weig Tevj aa-Do-ni-yaa Toq. huvb tiaj zyrug sruq Jiad sin mivb zipq ninb Eei maa yaag Do'q mGxvq pun ninb Eei maa, zyrug mivb zweid Jyenq ninb Eei huvb weig. ninb yaag Paaiq myenb txb nxm weig taaib pun ninb Eei maa zweid. ninb Eei maa zyrug zweid Jyenq ninb Eei Byaaug mcvj puv.
2.38: si-me-i tau huvb tiaj, “meib Navq naaiq nx kxvq se lovj Eei. meib Eei pru xij ei Jyenq yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj, kxvq Eei waag.” si-me-i zyrug yem Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem laub Eei.
2.31: huvb tiaj Buaj Be-nai-yaa, “ei Jyenq ninb Eei waag zruj a'q. zx'q taij taig, pyopq Jyenq. yo-aapg taij maiq zruj txvg uaq teij myenb, pun ninb Bua Eei Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq. Navq naaiq nx taij yo-aapg zyrug pun naaiq teij sig suv. yia Zauj yia Eei pyauq zov myenb zyrug maiq zu'g Daamb txv.
2.27: saa-lo-mxn zyrug zung aa-Bi-yaa-Taa Zwrtq, maiq tu'q zruj zyruq Eei sai myenb. Navq naaig zyrug pun zyruq yem si-lo kxvq e-li Eei pyauq zov myenb uaq teij waag Zwrtq taaib zyen.
2.41: maaib myenb Buaj saa-lo-mxn, si-me-i Zwrtq ye-lu-saa-lem mivb Tauj katg zivb cvj Rwrnj taaib a'q.
2.1: Daa-witq kwei seij Eei zyavb hog Tauj fatq a'q. ninb zyrug Paaiq waag pun ninb Eei txn, saa-lo-mxn.
2.39: Jiaj liud pua Havj, maaib i taub si-me-i Eei nrub pyauj mivb Tauj katg zivb Eei huvb, maa-aa-Kaa Eei txn, aa-Kitq. maaib myenb Buaj si-me-i, “meib Eei nrub yem katg zivb.”
2.10: Daa-witq zyrug kwei seij mig a'q. ninb Eei sei zavj Jyenq Daa-witq zivb.
2.25: saa-lo-mxn zyrug Paaiq ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, mivb zx'q aa-Do-ni-yaa taij taig.
2.22: saa-lo-mxn huvb tau ninb Eei maa, “maa weig haiq tiug Toq zx'q su-nem myenb Eei sia'q, aa-Bi-Qaakq, pun aa-Do-ni-yaa lovg zruj auq? lyemb kua'q Toq pun ninb maa'b! ninb zruj yia Eei kxj. meib Tevj ninb Toq yaag Tevj aa-Bi-yaa-Taa sai myenb Zauj sej-lu-yaa Eei txn, yo-aapg, Toq kua'q.”
2.42: huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb heug si-me-i taaib, kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia heug meib zyavq Jyenq zyruq lcvd waag yaag Kwinj meib maiq zeid? yia kxvq, ‘ta'faanb meib Zwrtq mivb kanb nxm txvj uaq Nxi, meib Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g taig.’ uaq zang meib tau yia, ‘meib Navq naaig kxvq se lovj Eei. yia yaag xij ei Jyenq meib Eei waag zruj.’
2.15: aa-Do-ni-yaa kxvq, “meib hiuq tu'q naaiq nxm kua'q mtaaib penj yia Eei. i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yaag Namq Jyenq yia tu'q zruj huvb. mq paag sig kxiq yeng. kua'q penj yia Eei yrud Eei, weig zu'g zyruq pun ninb mig a'q.
2.29: maaib myenb Buaj saa-lo-mxn huvb, “yo-aapg pyauj mivb zyruq Eei Dopg liub, yem ziab txvb ka'Len.” saa-lo-mxn zyrug Paaiq ye-ho-yaa-Daa Eei txn, Be-nai-yaa, mivb. ninb kxvq, “mivb a'q! mivb taij ninb a'q.”
2.30: Be-nai-yaa zyrug pia'g zyruq Eei Dopg liub kxvq, “huvb tiaj kxvq, ‘Zwrtq taaib maa'b!’+” yo-aapg tau, “yia maiq Zwrtq a'q. yia yem naaiq taig.” Be-nai-yaa mivb Buaj huvb tiaj, “yo-aapg Navq naaiq nx kxvq, Navq naaiq nx tau yia.”

20.18: Ben-haa-Datg kxvq, “sij kxvq ninb Bua taaib weig xij kxvq hxpg, lyemb navb zx'q ninb Bua. sij kxvq ninb Bua taaib Bx'q Jaaj, lyemb navb Eei zx'q ninb Bua maa'b!”
20.8: zwavj myenb koj Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj kxvq, “maiq tuvq mwavj, maiq tuvq lcvd.”
20.33: naaiq teij myenb haid ninb Navq naaiq nx kxvq zyrug syepg syepq Eei zx'q ninb Eei waag kxvq, “zeid Eei. Ben-haa-Datg Navq meib Eei yrud.” huvb tiaj kxvq, “mivb txb ninb taaib maa'b!” Ben-haa-Datg Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, aa-hapg heug ninb faauj aa-hapg Eei Bx'q Jaaj Zia.
20.3: ‘meib Eei Jyem Eaanb penj yia Eei. meib Eei kaub lovj Jiaj Eei auq Zauj fu'Jweiq yaag penj yia Eei.’+”
20.32: ninb Bua zyrug sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, mGxvq yaag Kru Jyenq Laav, mivb lxd i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb. ninb Bua kxvq, “meib Eei pru, Ben-haa-Datg, kxvq, ‘Toq meib lyrub ninb Eei mcvg og.’+” huvb tiaj tau, “ninb Zxg maaib mcvg Eei? ninb zruj Navq yia Eei yrud.”
20.21: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb Zwrtq zivb mivb Zaavq maad Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei Zia yaag taij si-lia myenb Zamq haig.
20.35: maaib kwanb trug waag myenb Eei yetg taub ziuj zyruq kxvq Eei waag Buaj Zauj ninb zruj kwanb Eei yetg taub txig, “Toq meib Bx'q yia.” mq paag uaq taub myenb maiq Kavq Bx'q ninb.
20.43: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg, zyrug Rwrnj Tauj saa-maa-lia, ninb Eei huvb ting uaq, yrug Qiaj Jiad yrug Raub.
20.40: mq paag yia, meib Eei pru, Eauq Jyenq naaiq Eauq Jyenq uaq Eei zyavb hog, maiq pwatg naaiq taub myenb mig a'q.” i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb kxvq, “meib Eei zwid mtaaib xij zu'g Navq naaig tivg weig zu'g meib kanb tivg liud a'q.”
20.14: aa-hapg naaig, “pavg haiq taub zruj?” trug waag myenb kxvq, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘pavg zwavj scvb zyruq Eei pcvb pyeiq lunj.’+” aa-hapg naaig, “haiq taub xij zu'g Jiad kxn Bx'q?” trug waag myenb tau, “meib xij zu'g Jiad kxn Bx'q.”
20.23: si-lia Eei huvb, Ben-haa-Datg, Eei Jyen kxvq Buaj ninb, “i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zyenb se yem Bov Eei zyenb ninb Bua Zivj taaib kaub henq Bua. mq paag pun Bua yem Daub pcvb Bx'q nx, Bua Dovg haaij zuvq kaub henq ninb Bua.
20.6: mq paag Fav Nxi leib maiq ko naaiq nxm zyavb hog, yia pun yia Eei Jyen mivb meib uaq sru meib Eei pyauq Zauj meib Eei Jyen Eei pyauq. ninb Bua pwatg haiq Euvg hxpg ninb Bua Eei Hruq, ninb Bua zyrug zx'q txb mivb a'q.’+”
20.34: Ben-haa-Datg kxvq, “yia Eei tia Zaavq meib Eei tia Eei uaq teij zivb yia xij fuvj Rwrnj pun meib. meib kunq lyepg meib kanb Eei heib hxvg yem Daa-matq-katg zivb Navq yia Eei tia yem saa-maa-lia lyepg nx.” aa-hapg kxvq, “ziuj meib kxvq Eei lyepg vcvg waag yia zyrug puvj meib mivb.” ninb zyrug Zauj Ben-haa-Datg lyepg vcvg waag cvj puvj ninb mivb a'q.
20.2: ninb Paaiq trug fyenj myenb pia'g zivb mivb Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, aa-hapg, “Ben-haa-Datg Navq naaiq nx kxvq,
20.36: ninb zyrug kxvq, “laaij meib maiq mwavj zyruq Eei waag, meib yetq leib yia, maaib taub syenb xij vaatg taig meib.” uaq taub myenb yetq leib Gxi Navq zyrug maaib taub syenb taaib vaatg taig ninb mig a'q.
20.20: kx'g myenb taij Zauj kx'g myenb Bx'q Jaaj uaq teij winb wavq. si-lia myenb pyauj, i-saa-laa-en myenb zung Jyenq kan ninb Bua Eei Ga'haaq Gaav, mq paag si-lia Eei huvb, Ben-haa-Datg, keb Jyenq maad Zauj keb maad Eei pcv Tiuj pyauj.
20.24: xij zu'g Navq naaiq nx zruj. Toq zx'q yetg zuvq huvb tiaj Zwrtq, maiq tuvq pun kunq Bx'q Jaaj Eei Jauq. cvj lyepg pcvb pyeiq tiq ninb Bua.
20.28: Tinb huvb Eei myenb taaib Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb, “zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘laaij si-lia myenb kxvq zyruq se yem Bov Eei zyenb, maiq zeid hxvd Eei zyenb, yia xij zx'q naaiq tomb kwanb pcv Jiu pun yem meib Eei puab Diaq. meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq ’+”
20.7: i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb heug uaq nxm teib puv Eei zwavj myenb koj taaib zunq, kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “mavg maa'b! naaiq taub myenb za'kevb xij Zua'q sig a'q, weig zu'g ninb pun waag taaib heug yia zx'q yia Eei auq, yia Eei fu'Jweiq Zauj yia Eei Jyem Eaanb fuvj mivb pun ninb. yia yaag maiq vcvg ninb.”
20.29: i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj si-lia myenb Eei Zyavq txib vaang. ninb Bua yem Zyavq siag Nxi. Tauj siag Nxi uaq Nxi ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb Bx'q Jaaj a'q. Du'g Nxi Navq i-saa-laa-en myenb taij yetg sinj taub si-lia myenb Eei yavb Jauq pcv.
20.19: naaiq teij myenb zyrug Zwrtq zivb mivb, se zwavj scvb zyruq Eei myenb lunj myenb. pcvb kwanb yaag kan Jyenq ninb Bua mivb.
20.17: scvb zyruq Eei myenb lunj myenb Zwrtq zivb Daavg. Ben-haa-Datg Paaiq myenb Zwrtq mivb zaab teib puv. ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib kxvq, “maaib myenb yem saa-maa-lia huvj Jyenq taaib a'q.”
20.38: naaiq taub trug waag myenb zyrug mivb sruq Jyenq Jaub Len zuaq huvb tiaj Jiaj. ninb lovg Dia pwav Jyenq mziv weig pun myenb zia'q maiq tu'q ninb.
20.31: ninb Eei Jyen kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Bua haid kxvq i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb Kxb lyenb myenb. pun yia Bua sai Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru yaag zx'q Laav Kru Jyenq mGxvq mivb lxd i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb. Riaj ninb xij lyrub meib Eei mcvg.”
20.30: si-lia myenb zevg Fiag Eei pcv pyauj pia'g aa-fekq zivb. zivb laatg Baav Fiag, Dapq taig i waang siag Zin taub. Ben-haa-Datg pyauj pia'g zivb ka'Euad pivj Jyenq zivb ka'Euad Jiaj Eei yetg Qovj.
20.27: i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag tiug Rxib pcv, pun Jyenq pyenb fwij, zyrug Zwrtq mivb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj. ninb Bua Navq i kwanb zo'g Eei yuvb lyepg Zyavq yem si-lia pcv Eei Zyavq txib vaang. si-lia Eei pcv pwavq Revg Daub peib.
20.11: i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb tau, “xij zu'g Buaj ninb, ‘maiq kcvb zu'q Bx'q Jaaj Eei zxvb zu'q mivb Bx'q Jaaj Eei myenb maiq hxpg zu'g puvj waab mauj Navq Bx'q liud Jaaj Jaiq Gxi Bx'q Jaaj Eei zxvb zu'q nx.’+”
20.5: trug fyenj myenb cvj taaib Rung kxvq, “Ben-haa-Datg Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yia pun waag mivb heug meib zx'q meib Eei Jyem Eaanb Zauj meib Eei auq, meib Eei fu'Jweiq Jiu pun yia.
20.9: aa-hapg huvb zyrug tau Ben-haa-Datg Eei trug fyenj myenb, “yia Eei zyruq, huvb tiaj aa'b! taaub Rung meib heug yia zruj Eei yetg zuvq yia xij ei Jyenq zruj. mq paag naaiq Rung Toq Eei yia maiq haib zruj.” trug fyenj myenb zyrug Rwrnj mivb Buaj Ben-haa-Datg.
20.16: zyavj luvb aanj ninb Bua Zwrtq zivb mivb Bx'q Jaaj txij Ben-haa-Datg Zauj Tevj ninb uaq teij faab zyepg Eeig taub huvb tiaj yem ninb Bua Eei Dopg liub hopq kau tiuq xij Gwin a'q.
20.41: uaq taub trug waag myenb zyrug syepg syepq Eei zx'q Gxi pwav mziv Eei Dia. i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb tiaj zyrug zia'q tu'q ninb penj yetg taub uaq teij trug waag myenb.
20.37: uaq taub trug waag myenb cvj pwavb zu'g kanb taub myenb zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “Toq Bx'q yia maa'b!” uaq taub myenb zyrug Bx'q ninb mun mig a'q.
20.39: huvb tiaj Jiaj Jauq uaq zang, uaq taub trug waag myenb heug Jyenq kxvq Buaj huvb tiaj, “meib Eei pru yem Bx'q Jaaj Zyavq uaq zang, maaib taub myenb txb taub zx'q taaib Eei winb wavq taaib kxvq, ‘kruj lovj naaiq taub myenb. sij kxvq ninb pyauj Dutq, meib Eei mcvg xij zu'g tiq ninb Eei mcvg. maiq zei c'q, xij zu'g Zwrtq Eig zyepg yetq Jxib Eaanb.’

19.11: zyruq kxvq, “Zwrtq mivb yem Bov kub vwaaig sruq Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.” zyruq zyrug Jiaj ninb Eei Ra'Myen. maaib henq haig Eei tomb Ryaauj pwrng taaib pun Bov yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Baav, la'pyeiq yaag Baaij. mq paag zyruq maiq yem Ryaauj. Ryaauj paag, Dau zyrug tovd, mq paag zyruq maiq yem Daub tovd ka'Euad.
19.1: aa-hapg zx'q e-li-yaa zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig, Zauj ninb Navq haiq nx lovg Ru'g Daauq taij Baa-an zyenb Eei zwavj sai myenb, kxvq Buaj ye-se-Ben.
19.10: e-li-yaa tau, “yia weig zyruq, nrnb Jiaj Eei Tinb huvb, Jxm Hruq Eei zruj weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en myenb kwavg meib Eei vcvg waag, Zc'q waaig meib Eei ziab txvb, lovg Ru'g Daauq taij meib Eei trug waag myenb. ib zang Kuvj zevg yia Du'g taub myenb Navq, ninb Bua yaag xij zx'q yia Eei mcvg.”

17.18: aub kwaaq kxvq Buaj e-li-yaa, “Tinb huvb Eei myenb aa'b! meib pwatg yia zruj haiq Euvg txvg meib fai? meib taaib naaiq pun yia Javj zu'g yia Eei zwid yaag pun yia Eei txn taig?”
17.3: “Zwrtq naaiq nxm txvj huvj Jyenq tov puv mcvj mivb Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj pivj Jyenq Ke-litq-Taa Do'g Len.
17.21: e-li-yaa zyrug Baapq Fiag uaq taub txn Eei sin pua Rung yaag heug zyruq, “o zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb aag, Toq pun naaiq taub txn Eei mcvg Rwrnj taaib yem ninb Eei sin.”
17.14: weig zu'g zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘yem ovj Eei Bwrnq maiq haib Revg, pcvb Eei yrub yaag maiq tavj, Tauj zyruq pun luvb twib Byuvg Fiag naaiq nxm teib puv.’+”
17.23: e-li-yaa yem kub vwaaig uaq Ravb pyauq Lxpq naaiq taub txn Fiag taaib pia'g pyauq mivb, Jiu naaiq taub txn pun ninb Eei maa yaag kxvq, “mavg maa'b! meib Eei txn navb taaib a'q.”
17.6: luvb Dxm Zauj luvb maanb Mwavj nx'g aa txb Fuaq Zauj xq taaib pun ninb Eang. ninb yaag hopq Do'q Eei uam.
17.20: ninb zyrug lovg Qiaj Bwi Eei heug zyruq, “o zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb aag, yia yem naaiq taub aub kwaaq Eei pyauq, meib yaag pun ninb zu'g ze'g naang, pun ninb Eei txn taig?”
17.24: uaq taub msia'q txn kxvq Buaj e-li-yaa, “ib zang yia hiuq tu'q meib se Tinb huvb Eei myenb. zyruq lovg meib Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag yaag za'kevb zyen Eei.”
17.7: yem kau, Do'q Eei uam Gaai mig a'q, weig zu'g yem uaq nxm teib puv luvb maiq twib Byuvg.
17.19: e-li-yaa tau, “zx'q meib Eei txn pun yia maa'b!” e-li-yaa zyrug zx'q uaq taub txn yem aub kwaaq Eei puad Lxpq taaib txb faauj kub vwaaig Tauj ninb yem uaq Qovj, an Jyenq Zruj.
17.17: yem kau, Ga'haaq pyaub zyruq Eei txn, se naaiq taub aub kwaaq Eei txn, putq pcvg. pcvg yaag Niaq haig, kunq zruj kunq Kruq, Tauj ninb Eei Qiaj tavj mig a'q.
17.11: aub kwaaq mivb zaavb uam uaq zang, e-li-yaa heug Jyenq kxvq, “Toq meib yaag txb ti'q tyen Fuaq taaib pun yia Eang og.”
17.5: e-li-yaa zyrug ei Jyenq zyruq Eei waag zruj. ninb mivb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj, Ke-litq-Taa Do'g Len.
17.9: “ib zang mivb sai-Dxn Eei saaj-le-fatq muvq yem Jyenq uaq. yia Paaiq zyavj yem uaq Eei yetg taub aub kwaaq Jwav meib.”
17.16: ovj Eei Bwrnq maiq Revg. pcvb Eei yrub yaag maiq tavj, ziuj zyruq lovg e-li-yaa kxvq Eei waag.
17.4: meib zyrug tu'q hopq Do'q Eei uam. yia yaag Paaiq nx'g aa yem naaig wij meib.”
17.10: e-li-yaa zyrug mivb saaj-le-fatq. Tauj muvq Eei laatg kcvb, ninb pwatg taub aub kwaaq yem uaq Raud zaavb. ninb zyrug heug naaiq taub aub kwaaq, “Toq zaavb teij uam taaib pun yia hopq og.”
17.22: zyruq mwavj e-li-yaa Eei Qiaj. naaiq taub txn Eei mcvg zyrug Rwrnj taaib yem ninb Eei sin, ninb zyrug navb taaib a'q.
17.12: naaiq taub aub kwaaq tau, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Buaj meib, yia maiq maaib Fuaq. yia Kuvj maaib Du'g Eau Bwrnq yem uaq ovj, yaag maaib ti'q tyen ka'lanq yrub yem uaq pcvb Navq. yia Raud zaavb txb Rwrnj mivb zruj Fuaq weig yia Zauj yia Eei txn. yia Bua Eang liud zyrug zuaq Jyenq taig a'q.”
17.15: ninb zyrug mivb ei Jyenq e-li-yaa Eei waag zruj. e-li-yaa Zauj uaq taub msia'q txn Zauj ninb Eei Mwavq txig zyrug maaib kauj Eang ziaj ziaj Nxi Eei.
17.13: e-li-yaa kxvq Buaj ninb, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. kunq Rwrnj mivb ei meib kxvq Eei waag zruj. lovg meib maaib Eei zruj nxm Fuab txn cvj txb taaib pun yia Daavg. Ga'haaq zruj weig meib Zauj meib Eei txn.
17.1: maaib taub Titq-Bi myenb, Buaj heug e-li-yaa, yem ki-le-aatg teig, Titq-Bi uaq nxm txvj taaib kxvq Buaj aa-hapg huvb, “yia zyavq Jyenq yetg liud zyavb Eei zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, tovb yia fub suj uaq taub, lcvd waag. naaiq teij i ziaj Havj luvb maiq twib Byuvg yaag maiq maaib Byuvb swiq, Zwrtq liud yia kxvq.”

11.18: ninb Bua yem mi-Dyen Zwrtq Jauq mivb Tauj paa-laan. yem paa-laan ninb Bua cvj txb teij myenb mivb Tauj i-yipq, mivb lxd i-yipq teib puv Eei faa-lo huvb. huvb tiaj pun pyauq Zauj livb teig cvj Jwav Eang hopq pun haa-Datg.
11.8: ninb cvj fib Navq Eei zruj weig pun ninb Eei yetg zuvq kanb fivj auq haib puaq huv fovg hxg ka'naaiq ziag ninb Bua Eei zyenb.
11.33: yia Navq naaiq zruj weig zu'g ninb kwavg yia mivb zavg sai-Dxn myenb Eei atg-Taa-lotq zyenb Eeid, Zauj mo-apg myenb Eei Ke-motq zyenb, Zauj am-mon myenb Eei mo-lekq zyenb. ninb maiq yavb yia Eei tob leid. ei yia mavg ninb yaag zruj maiq hxpg, maiq kan yia Eei livg Zauj leib latg Navq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, nx.
11.3: ninb lovg Zyetq pc'q taub huvb sia'q zruj auq, yaag maaib faamb pc'q taub Jaab zeib auq. ninb Eei auq yaag pcv ninb Eei Hruq mivb kanb puv.
11.32: mq paag weig yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, yaag weig yia yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj fivj kinq naaiq nxm ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, yia lyrub yetg fivj pun saa-lo-mxn kunq.
11.21: yem kau i-yipq teib puv, haa-Datg haid kxvq Daa-witq kwei seij mig a'q, tomb pcvb pyeiq, yo-aapg, yaag taig mig a'q. haa-Datg zyrug kxvq Buaj faa-lo, “Toq pun yia mivb a'q, pun yia tu'q Rwrnj yia kanb Eei kua'q.”
11.35: yia xij zx'q kua'q yem ninb Eei txn Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq yaag zx'q zyepg fivj Jiu pun meib.
11.43: saa-lo-mxn kwei seij mig a'q, yaag zavj Jyenq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei zivb. ninb Eei txn, le-hoj-Bo-am, Ripg Jyenq ninb zruj huvb.
11.40: saa-lo-mxn lxd Qavj taij ye-lo-Bo-am, mq paag ye-lo-Bo-am pyauj mivb i-yipq, Tauj i-yipq Eei si-sakq huvb, yem naaig Tauj saa-lo-mxn taig mivb.
11.14: zyruq pun taub e-Dom myenb, se e-Dom huvb Eei yetg taub funb fa'q, Buaj heug haa-Datg, zruj saa-lo-mxn Eei winb wavq.
11.23: Tinb huvb cvj pun taub myenb, se e-li-yaa-Daa Eei txn, le-son, zruj saa-lo-mxn Eei winb wavq. zinb Daavg le-son pyauj ninb Eei zyruq, soj-Baa Eei huvb, haa-Datg-e-se.
11.6: Navq naaig, ziuj zyruq pwatg, saa-lo-mxn zruj x'q haig Eei sig. ninb maiq lovg Revg Hruq kan zyruq Navq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, kan nx.
11.34: “+‘mq paag yia maiq zx'q zwavj kua'q yem saa-lo-mxn Eei puab Diaq Zwrtq. yia weig yia kinq taaib Eei pru, Daa-witq, kan lovj yia Eei livg Zauj leib latg, pun saa-lo-mxn zyavb seij tu'q kunq.
11.2: naaiq se zyruq kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, “maiq tuvq Zauj naaiq teij Janj txv Jaa, yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua Zauj meib Bua txv Jaa, weig zu'g ninb Bua zuvq xij pcv meib Bua mivb kan ninb Bua Eei zyenb.” mq paag saa-lo-mxn za'kevb Namq tu'q Erub haig naaiq teij sia'q.
11.36: yia xij Jiu yetg fivj pun ninb Eei txn weig pun yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, zanb zang maaib zeib fun yem yia kinq taaib weig lyepg yia Eei mevb naaiq nxm ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
11.20: Taa-pe-netq Eei Riad yuvd taub txn pun haa-Datg. naaiq taub txn Eei Buaj heug ke-nu-Batg. Taa-pe-netq pun ke-nu-Batg yem faa-lo Eei huvb ting kwavg Exj. ninb zyrug Zauj faa-lo kanb Eei txn yem uaq.
11.24: Daa-witq Bx'q paaig, taij Revg soj-Baa myenb uaq zang, le-son zyrug yua'g tu'q kwanb myenb faanq teib puv. ninb kanb zruj pyeiq. naaiq kwanb myenb mivb Daa-matq-katg zivb, yem naaig lyepg ninb zruj huvb.
11.28: ye-lo-Bo-am se maaib panb zeig Eei myenb. saa-lo-mxn pwatg naaiq taub Havb Jeiq lunj Eei mJavg txn, saa-lo-mxn zyrug Paaiq ninb kunq aapq zruj kov, yo-sepq Eei zeib fun Eei yetg zuvq kovb myenb.
11.7: yem ye-lu-saa-lem tov puv mcvj Eei Bov kub vwaaig, saa-lo-mxn zruj nxm Lav Eei txvj zavg mo-apg myenb Eei kamb Riaq haig Eei Ke-motq zyenb Zauj am-mon myenb Eei kamb Riaq haig Eei mo-lekq zyenb.
11.29: maaib Nxi ye-lo-Bo-am yem ye-lu-saa-lem Zwrtq mivb. yem si-lo Eei trug waag myenb, aa-hi-yaa, yem Jauq zavg pwavb zu'g ninb. aa-hi-yaa zu'q Jyenq syavb lwi. ninb Bua i taub yem uaq naab, levb Eei txvj.
11.19: haa-Datg hxpg faa-lo Eei Hruq haig, faa-lo zyrug zx'q ninb kanb Eei auq Eei Riad, se Taa-pe-netq huvb maag Eei Riad, pun haa-Datg lovg zruj auq.
11.17: uaq zang haa-Datg Zxg faij Eei. ninb Zauj teij e-Dom myenb, se ninb Eei tia Eei Jyen, pyauj mivb yem i-yipq teib puv.
11.38: sij kxvq meib mwavj yia hatg meib Eei yetg zuvq waag yaag yavb yia Eei tob leid, kan yia Eei livg Zauj leib latg, zyrug ei yia mavg zruj tu'q hxpg Navq yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, zruj nx, yia xij Zauj meib yem. yia zyrug lyepg wrnq meib Eei huvb trub Navq yia lyepg Daa-witq Eei nx, yaag zx'q i-saa-laa-en Jiu pun meib.
11.31: ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj ye-lo-Bo-am, “kunq zx'q zyepg Kwaaiq mivb weig zu'g zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, kxvq, ‘yia xij zx'q yem saa-lo-mxn Eei puab Diaq Eei kua'q petq Zwrtq mivb yaag pun zyepg fivj meib.
11.30: aa-hi-yaa zx'q ninb kanb zu'q Jyenq Eei syavb lwi petq zruj zyepg Eeig Kwaaiq.
11.27: yem naaiq mivb kxvq ye-lo-Bo-am Navq haiq nx vcvg huvb tiaj Eei Jaub lrug. saa-lo-mxn zxg min-lo yaag zxg ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei zivb, se zxg zivb laatg Tov Eei txvj.
11.11: weig naaiq zyruq kxvq Buaj saa-lo-mxn. “laaij meib Navq naaiq nx Namq, meib yaag maiq ei Jyenq yia lcvd Eei vcvg waag Zauj yia hatg Eei leib latg, yia zuvq xij zx'q meib Eei kua'q petq mivb Jiu pun taub meib Eei Jyen.
11.5: saa-lo-mxn kan sai-Dxn myenb Eei atg-Taa-lotq zyenb Eeid, yaag kan am-mon myenb kamb Riaq haig Eei mo-lekq zyenb.
11.9: zyruq Qiaj Jiad haig saa-lo-mxn, weig zu'g saa-lo-mxn Eei Hruq leib zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, tovb hing Zwrtq pun ninb pwatg i Rung Eei Tinb huvb.
11.16: yo-aapg Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb yem naaig Ju'q Laaj Eia'g zuaq Tauj ninb Bua taij Revg e-Dom myenb Eei yetg zuvq mJavg txn.
11.41: Zwrtq liud naaiq teij sig, saa-lo-mxn zruj Eei yetg zuvq Zauj ninb Eei Zovb mevb waag fiaq Jyenq saa-lo-mxn Eei huvb trub taan.
11.37: ye-lo-Bo-am aag, yia pun meib sweib eij kunq Tauj haaij yaag lyepg meib zruj huvb kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb.
11.39: laaij saa-lo-mxn Eei zwid, yia xij pun Daa-witq Eei zeib fun zu'g tivg zwid, mq paag maiq zeid yetg liud.’+”
11.4: saa-lo-mxn Havb Jeiq koj Eei zyavb hog, ninb Eei auq Bua pcv ninb Eei Hruq mivb kan Eiag Eei zyenb. ninb maiq lovg Revg Hruq kan zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Navq ninb Eei tia, Daa-witq, lovg Revg Hruq kan nx.
11.10: maiq kunq zyruq hatg saa-lo-mxn maiq tuvq kan Eiag Eei zyenb, ninb maiq ei zyruq hatg Eei waag zruj.
11.22: faa-lo naaig kaaj, “meib Zauj yia yem naaiq meib Zaa haiq Euvg Zivj taaib ib zang xij Rwrnj meib kanb Eei teib puv?” haa-Datg tau, “maiq Zaa haiq Euvg. mq paag Toq meib pun yia Rwrnj.”
11.12: mq paag weig meib Eei tia, Daa-witq, yem meib zyavb Jyenq Eei zyavb hog, yia maiq kcvb zruj. zuaq meib Eei txn zruj huvb Eei zyavb hog yia Zivj petq Zwrtq.
11.42: saa-lo-mxn yem ye-lu-saa-lem kunq i-saa-laa-en myenb feij zyepg Havj.
11.15: zinb Daavg Daa-witq yem e-Dom Bx'q Jaaj, tomb pcvb pyeiq, yo-aapg, faauj mivb pyopq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb uaq zang, ninb yaag taij Revg e-Dom Eei yetg zuvq mJavg txn.
11.13: mq paag yia maiq zx'q zyavb nxm kua'q petq Zwrtq. weig yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, yaag weig yia kinq taaib Eei zivb, ye-lu-saa-lem, yia zyrug lyrub yetg fivj pun meib Eei txn.”
11.1: saa-lo-mxn Namq haig kanb fivj myenb Eei sia'q Zamq haig. Zwrtq liud faa-lo huvb Eei sia'q ninb lovg mo-apg myenb, am-mon myenb, e-Dom myenb, sai-Dxn myenb Zauj hitq-Tai myenb Eei sia'q.
11.26: cvj maaib ne-Batg Eei txn, ye-lo-Bo-am, vcvg saa-lo-mxn. ye-lo-Bo-am zruj saa-lo-mxn Eei Jyen, se yem sej-le-Daa taaib Eei e-faa-im myenb. ninb Eei maa se aub kwaaq, Buaj heug sej-lu-waa.
11.25: yem saa-lo-mxn zyavb Jyenq Eei Nxib Eia'g, le-son zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei winb wavq, Zeuj lung teib puv Navq haa-Datg nx. le-son zruj huvb kunq si-lia teib puv yaag Rxv i-saa-laa-en myenb.

5.18: saa-lo-mxn zruj pyauq Eei zavg myenb Zauj hi-laam zruj pyauq Eei zavg myenb Zauj ke-Baan myenb, zu'g la'pyeiq yaag liug leid zyavj Dyavj weig zruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
5.3: “meib hiuq tu'q laaij Zauj puvb puv weib kxmj Eei winb wavq Bx'q Jaaj, yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, maiq tu'q Zeij pyauq weig zyruq, ninb Eei Tinb huvb, Eei mevb. zuaq Tauj zyruq pun ninb Eei winb wavq yem ninb Eei zaub Diaq.
5.8: hi-laam cvj wib waag pun saa-lo-mxn. ninb kxvq, “meib fuvj pun yia Eei waag yia tu'q zipq mig a'q. yia zyrug ziuj meib Toq uaq teij sij-Daa zovb Dyavj Zauj zovb Dyavj pun meib.
5.9: yia Eei kovb myenb xij yem le-Baa-nxn keb wrng Dyavj Fiag Tauj Kxiq. Tauj Kxiq zyrug kitq penj Baib, Rcv mivb Tauj meib tivg zyavj Eei txvj. yem naaig Jaiq Gxi Dyavj, meib zyrug haib txb Jyenq mivb a'q. meib yaag xij zu'g ziuj yia Toq Eei waag liug leid Eang hopq pun yia Eei pyauq zov myenb.”
5.7: hi-laam mwavj haid saa-lo-mxn Eei waag, ninb kevb a'Neiq haig. ninb kxvq, “ib Nxi xij zu'g Zev zyruq weig zu'g ninb pun Daa-witq tu'q taub Zovb mevb Eei txn kunq naaiq Lo haig Eei fivj.”
5.5: yia zyrug Jiad Hruq xij Zeij nxm pyauq weig zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb, Eei mevb, Navq zyruq Buaj yia Eei tia, Daa-witq, Eei waag. zyruq kxvq, ‘meib Eei txn, tovb yia xij pun tiq meib Ripg Jyenq zweid meib Eei weig uaq taub, xij Zeij nxm pyauq weig yia Eei mevb.’
5.16: kanb Za'levg cvj maaib pua Zin faamb pc'q taub zruj Lo Eei myenb kunq kov, yaag kunq zruj kov Eei myenb.
5.17: ziuj huvb tiaj Paaiq Eei waag, myenb zu'g zyavj Jaaij haig, Lo haig Eei tomb la'pyeiq weig lovg zu'g zyavj Eei la'pyeiq lyepg zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kxnb Do'q.
5.14: ninb Paaiq naaiq teij myenb zruj pua kwanb Tiuq Jyenq mivb le-Baa-nxn, yetg Laaj yetg waang taub. Navq naaig ninb Bua zyrug yem le-Baa-nxn yetg Laaj Eia'g, cvj yem pyauq i Laaj Eia'g. aa-Do-ni-lam kunq naaiq teij zu'g aapq taaib zruj kov Eei myenb.
5.4: mq paag ib zang zyruq, yia Eei Tinb huvb, pun yia yem puvb puv Taaib pcvb, maiq maaib winb wavq yaag maiq maaib sig.
5.2: saa-lo-mxn cvj wib waag Rwrnj pun hi-laam. ninb kxvq,
5.6: “Navq naaig, Toq Paaiq meib Eei myenb weig yia kxij sij-Daa zovb Dyavj. yia Eei myenb yaag Zauj meib Eei myenb haib lomb Rxib zruj. ziuj meib tivg taaib Eei kovb zinb yia mtaaib pun meib weig Zivq meib Eei myenb, weig zu'g meib hiuq tu'q yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj maiq maaib haiq taub haib kxij Dyavj Dovg sai-Dxn myenb.”
5.13: saa-lo-mxn huvb yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb kinq Zwrtq pua waang taub kovb myenb aapq Tevj zruj kov.
5.12: zyruq Zeij Zovb mevb pun saa-lo-mxn ziuj ninb lcvd Eei waag. hi-laam Zauj saa-lo-mxn Jiu Tov maaib pcvb xn, laanb Zauj laanb lyepg Jiad vcvg waag.
5.15: saa-lo-mxn yaag maaib siag waang taub pyenb ka'naaiq Eei myenb yaag maaib Yetg waang yem Bovb aiq txvj zu'g la'pyeiq.
5.11: saa-lo-mxn yaag fuvj i sinj i waang Tovq Byaub witq Zauj i waang i Zin Tovq zyen ka'lanq yrub mivb pun hi-laam weig ninb Eei pyauq zov myenb Eei Eang hopq. saa-lo-mxn Havb Havj Navq naaiq nx fuvj pun hi-laam.
